Package net.tvburger.jdl.model.nn.training.initializers

package net.tvburger.jdl.model.nn.training.initializers
Defines the neural network initialization algorithms

  • Class
    Description
    ConstantInitializer
    Implements an initializer that sets all parameters (weights and bias) to a given constant.
    HeInitializer
    He (Kaiming) weight initializer.
    NeuralNetworkInitializer
    The initializer is used to set the initial parameter value of a neuron
    NeuralNetworkInitializers
    Utility for obtaining (singleton) instances of initializers.
    RandomNormalizedWeightInitializer
    Implements a random initializer.
    XavierInitializer
    Xavier (Glorot) weight initializer.
